SongLyrics.JpnStr: あのバンドの歌[うた]がわたしには
SongLyrics.EngStr: That band's song to me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 甲高[かんだか]く響[ひび]く笑[わら]い声[ごえ]に聞[き]こえる
SongLyrics.EngStr: Sounds like a high-pitched laughing voice

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あのバンドの歌[うた]がわたしには
SongLyrics.EngStr: That band's song to me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: つんざく踏切[ふみきり]の音[おと]みたい
SongLyrics.EngStr: Is like the piercing sound of a railroad crossing

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 背中[せなか]を押[お]すなよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Don't push my back

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もうそこに列車[れっしゃ]が来[く]る
SongLyrics.EngStr: The train is already coming

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 目[め]を閉[と]じる 暗闇[くらやみ]に差[さ]す後光[ごこう]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Closing my eyes, a halo pierces the darkness

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 耳[みみ]塞[ふさ]ぐ 確[たし]かに刻[きざ]む鼓動[こどう]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Covering my ears, a definite beating of the heart

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 胸[むね]の奥[おく] 身[み]を揺[ゆ]らす心臓[しんぞう]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Deep in my chest, my heart shakes my body

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ほかに何[なに]も聴[き]きたくない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't want to hear anything else

SongLyrics.JpnStr: わたしが放[はな]つ音[おと]以外[いがい]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Other than the sound I make

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 不協和音[ふきょうわおん]に居場所[いばしょ]を探[さが]したり
SongLyrics.EngStr: Looking for a place in the dissonance

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 悲[かな]しい歌[うた]に救[すく]われていたんだけど
SongLyrics.EngStr: I was saved by sad songs, but

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あのバンドの歌[うた]が誰[だれ]かにはギプスで
SongLyrics.EngStr: That band's song is a cast for someone

SongLyrics.JpnStr: わたし(だけが)間違[まちが]いばかりみたい
SongLyrics.EngStr: It seems I'm the only one making mistakes

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 目[め]を閉[と]じる 暗闇[くらやみ]に差[さ]す後光[ごこう]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Closing my eyes, a halo pierces the darkness

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 耳[みみ]塞[ふさ]ぐ 確[たし]かに刻[きざ]む鼓動[こどう]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Covering my ears, a definite beating of the heart

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 胸[むね]の奥[おく] 身[み]を揺[ゆ]らす心臓[しんぞう]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Deep in my chest, my heart shakes my body

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ほかに何[なに]も聴[き]きたくない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't want to hear anything else

SongLyrics.JpnStr: わたしが放[はな]つ音[おと]以外[いがい]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Other than the sound I make

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いらない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't need it

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 背中[せなか]を押[お]すなよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Don't push my back

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 容易[たやす]く心[こころ]触[さわ]るな
SongLyrics.EngStr: Don't easily touch my heart

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 出発[しゅっぱつ]のベルが鳴[な]る
SongLyrics.EngStr: The departure bell rings

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 乗客[じょうきゃく]は私[わたし]一人[ひとり]だけ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm the only passenger

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 手[て]を叩[たた]く わたしだけの音[おと]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Clapping my hands, only my sound

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 足[あし]鳴[な]らす 足跡[そくせき]残[のこ]すまで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Making noise with my feet until I leave footprints

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 目[め]を開[あ]ける 孤独[こどく]の称号[しょうごう]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Opening my eyes, the title of solitude

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 受[う]け止[と]める 孤高[ここう]の衝動[しょうどう]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Accepting the impulse of solitude

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今[いま] 胸[むね]の奥[おく] 確[たし]かめる心音[しんおん]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Now, deep in my chest, confirming the heartbeat

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ほかに何[なに]も聴[き]きたくない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't want to hear anything else

SongLyrics.JpnStr: わたしが放[はな]つ音[おと]以外[いがい]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Other than the sound I make
